content: designed to be a versatile warm-weather or layering garment this crochet vest is perfect for any season easy to crochet with red heart all in one granny square yarn simply stitch your basic 6 granny squares from start to finish - no changing colors required then join squares and add a solid edging with red heart super saver this easy pattern will keep you entertained with chain slip_stitch double_crochet single_crochet and so much more gauge motif = approx 6 15 cm square red heart® all in one™ granny square™ 8 8 oz/250 g 417 yds/381m red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast b soft white 0316
